_header: Well were him that wist / To whom he might trust
Note: First two lines same as 6208 and 6209.
_description: A warning against false friends — one 6-line tail-rhyme stanza

BodAsh1438.First Lines:
Wel wer hym þat wyst to wham he moght trist
                    …
BodAsh1438.Last Lines: …the falce fro the trewclothyd yn oon wede
